Title: More Than A Rock
Description:
<The shards are smooth and slightly hot to the touch. Lightning sparks deep within their core.>

<Maybe Watu or Olekk would know more.>

<The thought of parting with the shard fills you with compulsion to hold the shard close. To keep it forever.>
ObjectivesText: Show the Stormtouched Shards to Watu.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Watu in Pinewood Post.
RewardText: <Watu doesn't register your presence. He remains sitting, favoring the injured leg, and has his eyes closed.>
